Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: By analysing tumour DNA from patients with sporadic T - cell prolymphocytic leukaemia ( T - PLL ) , a rare clonal malignancy with similarities to a mature T - cell leukaemia seen in A - T , we demonstrate a high frequency of ATM mutations in T - PLL .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease          |
|------------------|
| Sporadic T - cell prolymphocytic leukaemia (T - PLL) |
| A - T mature T - cell leukaemia |
| ATM mutations in T - PLL |
